attributes.description:
New Arrival Coming @ Bidvest McCarthy Silverlakes.

2020 Kia Picanto 1.0 Start Red color Manual with 41000kms.

Test drives at your door, depending on your location. All vehicles come with certificates from Dekra. 

Trade-Ins are welcome. Delivery to your door. 

Finance Requirements: 
1. Copy of ID  
2. Copy of Driver’s License 
3. Proof of Address 
4. 3 Months Bank Statements & 3 Months Payslips 
Price excluding License and Registration as well as Delivery Fee and is subject to your location. 

Contact *Mac from Bidvest McCarthy Isuzu, we are based in Pretoria Silverlakes. 

Contact Mac @Bidvest on 0645472149 ( Call or WhatsApp)

This legendary 7 seater has been transporting family's across SA for over 10 years. Very well looked after with service history and spare keys. Fitted with Power steering, Air con with rear cool, E/Windows (Front and rear), E/Folding Mirrors, Factory fitted central locking on remote, Cream leather interior, Multi function steering wheel, Aftermarket blue tooth system, CD Front loader, On board computer, Cruise control, Rear Diff lock, Nudge bar, Running boards, Tow bar, Roof rails and Alloy mag wheels.

 Finance available. please contact me for application or for viewing.

All vehicles sold with 1 month/1500kms warranty OR 2 year mechanical breakdown warranty as optional.

All trade-ins welcome. 

Theos Bakkie Sales.
73 Van Riebeeck Road.
Kuilsriver.
